extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the local Shelly REST Api.

    See https://shelly-api-docs.shelly.cloud

      • setRelayTurn

        public void setRelayTurn​(int index,
                         boolean value)
                  throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
        Turns the relay with the given index on or off.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the relay
        value - true to turn on; false to turn off
        Throws:
        OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException - on error
